Params[3]: Does your belief really align with ours?

Params[4]: Some of it, at the very least.

Params[3]: Hmph, what a diplomatic way to put it...
Not that I don't believe in you. I've seen the choices you made during our previous fights together.
But Oasis is still too fragile at the moment. I have to protect it as its leader.
One day... I'll let you be among them. Truly among them.

Params[4]: How long do humans have to wait?

Params[3]: If we can work on it together... I'm sure it won't be long...
Sir! A group of Corrupted spotted in the west! They launched an attack!
You stay right here! Don't get any closer!
